actions: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
*Melee Weapon Attack:* +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.
name: Giant Badger
traits: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
